title: Help with logo fonts please
content:
Looking for fonts for both GRANITE and STATE please. any help would be appreciated

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [GRANITE.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831064626/http:/typophile.com/files/GRANITE.jpg) | 30.45 KB |
author: darksympho

comments.content:
STATE: should be [USA](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831064626/http:/www.dafont.com/usa.font) by Iconian Fonts, may be scaled  
GRANITE: thought I could find a match but came to nothing perfect. Still pretty convinced it's a techy freebie or a cutomization based on (various?) techy freebie. Try having a look to these 2 sections at DaFont, may be you'll be luckier than me: [Techno \> Sci-fi](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831064626/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=303), [Techno \> Various](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831064626/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=304) ( [TR-909](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831064626/http:/www.dafont.com/tr909.font), [Terminator](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831064626/http:/www.dafont.com/terminator.font), [Boom Box](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831064626/http:/www.dafont.com/boom-box.font)...)  
Posting reworked sample too, could be helpful for some other identifiers...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831064626im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-2_5090.png)

EDIT: finally, got it! That was [Boom Box](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831064626/http:/www.dafont.com/boom-box.font) but [full lowercase](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831064626/http:/www.dafont.com/boom-box.font?text=granite) and not uppercase...
Thank you very much for your help! I really appreciate it!! :)
